name: 31ways
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: 31WAYS is self-improvement program based on the completion of small but meaningful daily activities know as challenges. The basis of this program comes from the behavior economic theory of “nudges” which are small behavior changes that result in substantial improvements.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
